columns.name: Outflow
columns.description: Amount paid out (debits, may be empty)

columns.name: Inflow
columns.description: Amount paid in (credits, may be empty)

notes: PTSB is an Irish bank, so amounts are typically in EUR (Euros)
Outflow is for debits (negative transactions), Inflow is for credits (positive transactions)
One of Outflow or Inflow will be empty for each transaction
Payee field contains merchant names or transaction details
